tool_description: Adjusts maintenance schedules to accommodate emergency repairs and urgent maintenance requests while minimizing disruption.

requested_completion_time.description: When emergency maintenance must be completed

affected_schedules.description: Schedule IDs that may be impacted

error_messages: Invalid equipment reference: emergency_equipment_id not found in registered equipment.
Invalid emergency priority: Use one of [urgent, critical, emergency_shutdown].
Invalid completion time: requested_completion_time must be a valid future ISO 8601 date-time.
Invalid schedule references: One or more schedule IDs not found.
Invalid estimated hours: Must be between 0.5 and 12.0 hours.
Insufficient available resources: No technicians available with required skills in the requested timeframe.
usage: Provide emergency_equipment_id, emergency_priority, requested_completion_time, affected_schedules array, required_technician_skills, and estimated_emergency_hours to reschedule maintenance priorities and accommodate emergency repairs.

adjustment_plan_id.description: Unique identifier for the schedule adjustment plan

rescheduled_tasks.description: Array of task IDs that were rescheduled

assigned_emergency_technician.description: Technician ID assigned to emergency repair

estimated_impact_hours.description: Total hours of delayed maintenance due to emergency

new_emergency_schedule_time.description: Confirmed time slot for emergency maintenance
